manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_deam_searchsingle_actset` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL, `act_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `is_info` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `need_info` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `is_subscribe` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `starttime` int(11) NOT NULL, `endtime` int(11) NOT NULL, `is_area` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `in_area` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `pagetitle` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `gzimage` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `qrcodeimage` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `is_jssdk` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `share_img` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_desc` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `copyright` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `is_delete` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `rule_id` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `reply_title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `reply_img` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `reply_description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_deam_searchsingle_guanzhu` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `aid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `gztime` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `openid_2` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_deam_searchsingle_members` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `act_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `avatar` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `nickname` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `realname` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `telphone` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `maxscore` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `alltime` int(11) DEFAULT '1000', `createtime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `maxscore` (`maxscore`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
